reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 386/07: PRESCRIBED AGENCIES, CROWN AS EMPLOYER
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 386/07: PRESCRIBED AGENCIES, CROWN AS EMPLOYER

content.content: 1. The following agencies of the Crown are prescribed for the purposes of clause (b) of the definition of “Crown employee” in subsection 1 (1) of the Act: 1.  Revoked: O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1 (1). 2. Algonquin Forestry Authority. 3.  Revoked: O. Reg. 177/19, s. 1. 4.  Revoked: O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1 (2). 5. Liquor Control Board of Ontario. 6. McMichael Canadian Art Collection. 6.1 Metrolinx. 7. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation. 8. The Niagara Parks Commission. 8.1 Ontario Cannabis Retail Corporation. 9. Ontario Public Service Pension Board. 10.  Revoked:  O. Reg. 204/11, s. 1. 11. Ottawa Convention Centre Corporation. 12. Science North. 13. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal. 14. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board. O. Reg. 386/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 204/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1; O. Reg. 31/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 18/19, s. 1; O. Reg. 177/19, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following agencies of the Crown are prescribed for the purposes of clause (b) of the definition of “Crown employee” in subsection 1 (1) of the Act:

1. Revoked: O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1 (1).

2. Algonquin Forestry Authority.

3. Revoked: O. Reg. 177/19, s. 1.

4. Revoked: O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1 (2).

5. Liquor Control Board of Ontario.

6. McMichael Canadian Art Collection.

6.1 Metrolinx.

7. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation.

8. The Niagara Parks Commission.

8.1 Ontario Cannabis Retail Corporation.

9. Ontario Public Service Pension Board.

10. Revoked:  O. Reg. 204/11, s. 1.

11. Ottawa Convention Centre Corporation.

12. Science North.

13. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal.

14. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board. O. Reg. 386/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 204/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 112/17, s. 1; O. Reg. 31/18, s. 1; O. Reg. 18/19, s. 1; O. Reg. 177/19, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 386/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 386/07, s. 2.
